word:
Thursday, April 27, 1876, Oakland, California, Ellen White to James White 


     Dear Husband: . . . We have just completed twenty pages on the parable of the Sower. This was rather a trying subject to write upon, but Mary and I have read it over this afternoon, and we pronounce it excellent, excellent. She says the subjects grow better and better, every one. She is just happy over this work.--Letter 15, 1876, p. 2.
